mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_class_fixed_param ( `year`, production_depreciation_charge, sales_expenses_after_sales_service_fee_benchmark_income, administrative_expenses_depreciation_charge, administrative_expenses_other_income, financial_cost_monetary_capital, financial_cost_shortterm_borrowing, long_term_loan, bonds_payable, benchmark_energy_cost, strategy_benchmark_energy_cost, sales_adjusted_unit_energy_cost, benchmark_final_operating_tax_surcharge, strategy_benchmark_final_operating_tax_surcharge, final_operating_tax_surcharge, income_tax_expense, undistributed_profits_withdrawal_surplus_reserves, undistributed_profits_distribution_shareholders, undistributed_profits_other, class_id ) SELECT `year`, production_depreciation_charge, sales_expenses_after_sales_service_fee_benchmark_income, administrative_expenses_depreciation_charge, administrative_expenses_other_income, financial_cost_monetary_capital, financial_cost_shortterm_borrowing, long_term_loan, bonds_payable, benchmark_energy_cost, strategy_benchmark_energy_cost, sales_adjusted_unit_energy_cost, benchmark_final_operating_tax_surcharge, strategy_benchmark_final_operating_tax_surcharge, final_operating_tax_surcharge, income_tax_expense, undistributed_profits_withdrawal_surplus_reserves, undistributed_profits_distribution_shareholders, undistributed_profits_other, #{classId} FROM t_conf_fixed_param
